data.max_tokens: Maximum tokens to return in response

data_description.prompt: Instruct how the LLM should respond. This can be a template.
data_description.reasoning_effort: How many reasoning tokens the model should generate before creating a response to the prompt (for certain reasoning models)
data_description.web_search: Allow the model to search the web for the latest information before generating a response
data_description.search_context_size: High level guidance for the amount of context window space to use for the search
data_description.user_location: Refine search results based on geography

error.model_not_supported: This model is not supported, please select a different model
error.web_search_not_supported: Web search is not supported by this model

generate_image.name: Generate image
generate_image.description: Turns a prompt into an image

config_entry.name: Config entry
config_entry.description: The config entry to use for this action

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.description: The text to turn into an image

size.name: Size
size.description: The size of the image to generate

quality.name: Quality
quality.description: The quality of the image that will be generated

background.name: Background
background.description: Allows to set transparency for the background of the generated image

moderation.name: Moderation
moderation.description: Control the content-moderation level for generated images

generate_content.name: Generate content
generate_content.description: Sends a conversational query to ChatGPT including any attached image or PDF files

config_entry.name: Config entry
config_entry.description: The config entry to use for this action

organization_verification_required.title: Organization verification required
organization_verification_required.description: Your organization must be verified to use the model `gpt-image-1`. Please go to: https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/general and click on Verify Organization. If you just verified, it can take up to 15 minutes for access to propagate.

generate_image_deprecated_params.title: Deprecated parameters for image generation service
generate_image_deprecated_params.description:
OpenAI integration now uses `gpt-image-1` model to generate images when calling `openai_conversation.generate_image`, which supports different set of parameters.
Please update your scripts or automations.
